group_1.textLeft: Well? Have you made your decision?

group_1.textRight: If she tries to stop us, I will get rid of@her.

group_1.textLeft: Ahhh! Eccellente! That is the greatest@outcome I could hope for!
The tragedy of dear friends having to fight@each other!

group_1.textRight: More importantly, how are things going with@raising the Witches?

group_1.textLeft: I'm still raising one Witch to determine@if it can be used for our defense.
I think it's quite adorabile. It'd be a shame@if it were to be erased.
But if it wasn't for that argument we had...
I might've been able to go even further.@That makes I, Alina, very upset indeed.
Upset with you? Are you joking? That's @unusual coming from you.
I'm perfectly aware of our situation.
I know if you hadn't stopped us, we would@have caused the whole operation to collapse.
But if you still feel guilty, you may make@it up to me by serving as my model.

group_1.textRight: All right... But just for a little while.

group_1.textLeft: Nemu... It's rare to see you out here.
Did you need me for something?

group_1.textRight: I'd like you to find a shrine for me.
It's necessary for me to create the [textBlue:Rumor]@you gave me inspiration for.
An unpopular location that's difficult to@find would be preferable, if possible.
And it would be ideal if the place itself@held some kind of strong power.

group_1.textLeft: What's with all these greedy requests?

group_1.textCenter: I was the one who asked her to do this. I'll@find one.

group_1.textRight: I'll leave it to you, then.
